page.title: 11LOCAL GOVERNMENT
page.content: Hinderclay is in the area administered by Mid Suffolk District Council with offices at Needham Market, while Thelnetham is administered by St. Edmundsbury District Council with offices at Bury St. Edmunds. Both these District Councils are in turn under Suffolk County Council. Both parishes of Hinderclay & Thelnetham have their own Parish Councils. The job centre and social security office for the area are in Diss. Once every 2 weeks the Suffolk Mobile Library Service visits the area stopping for a few minutes in each village.
